mapper.select: /* kr.ac.usu.student.mapper.StudentAbsenceMapper.selectAbsenceList */ WITH CONFMVIEW AS ( SELECT COM_CODE , COM_CODE_GRP , COM_CODE_NM , COM_CODE_DESC , USE_YN , COM_CODE_SEQ , UPPER_CODE_GRP , UPPER_COM_CODE FROM COM_CODE WHERE COM_CODE_GRP = 'SEC013' ) SELECT ABSSKL_NO , SUBSTR(ABSSKL_NO,2,2)||'년 '|| SUBSTR(ABSSKL_NO,4,1)||'학기' AS REQ_SEM , STDNT_NO , /* REPLACE(ABSSKL_DATE,'/', '') */ ABSSKL_DATE , ABSSKL_CN , ABSSKL_YR , ABSSKL_SEMSTR , CV.COM_CODE_NM CONFM_SE , ABSSKL_RETURN FROM ABSENCE_SCHOOL ABS INNER JOIN CONFMVIEW CV ON (ABS.CONFM_SE = CV.COM_CODE) WHERE STDNT_NO = #{stdntNo}
